text:
Ceki Gulcu OR Yoav Shapira

The website renders improperly in IE7 and has a few of the same issues in 
Firefox and IE6.  In IE7 the first link to the documentation is unreachable 
with the mouse and the top text is unreadable for most other pages.  I would 
attach a screen shot but I do not see how using bugzilla.  I believe the 
following two changes would correct the problem without breaking any other 
browsers that already render correctly, though you may wish to test it first.
1) add "position: absolute;" to the centercol class in site.css
2) close the centercol div tag immediately before the leftcol div tag instead 
of immediately after.

I believe that will correct every page on the site, but again you would need 
to test it first.
